caption: A man and a woman are talking about something in an office. At night, a man rushed into his house, and he is scared to find something. In the next day, he is found to be dead. In the police office, two men are saying something to a policeman, and they then go to the room of the dead person. They find some evidence there, and two of them then leave and walk on the street. A meet a person who is painting on a door and they start to talk. Suddenly, some people arrive and two men run away, one man is left.
